General.Name: Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power
General.Description: Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells wind towers in China. Its wind towers support various kinds of turbines from 100KW to 3MW. The company was formerly known as Ruian Pressure Vessel Factory and changed its name to Shanghai Taisheng Wind Power Equipment Co., Ltd. in 2009. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
